page.title: 20Credits
page.content: The information for the{Faldingworth Block has been compiled, edited and typed by the following children; Tracy Mettam Mark Mulhern Emma Taylor Stephen Ward Andrew Rowett Matthew Herring Andrew Leighton Helen Cook Jonathon Mitchell-Smith Helen Carter Rene Van Breukelen Kevin O'Donnell Steven Parker with assistance from their teacher, Mr R Kitchen, who also took the photographs. We would also like to thank Mr R Richardson and Mr F Spalding, two members of the village community, who came in to talk to the children and gave us much of our information, Mr A Jollands of F.J.H. Ltd., and J S Carter & Sons.
